name: DB - DataBattles, a Tower Defense Game
name_original: DB - DataBattles, a Tower Defense Game
description:
This is a small Tower Defense game. It´s purpose is to enlighten people on the topic of data security. The player fights against different types of data with the help of turrets, like magnets, ... (more coming soon)

How to play:

t: Opens/Closes turret menu

Left click a turret to buy it, another left click places it / right click reverts the process

The cursor will switch to a red circle, if the turret can´t be placed (e.g. on other turrets)

Music:

music is originally made by joshuaempyre . All rights of "Arcade Music Loop" are obtained by him.
